import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' function Encode() { const [inputMessage, setMessage] = useState(""); const [rotorOne, setRotorOne] = useState('I'); const [rotorTwo, setRotorTwo] = useState('I'); const [rotorThree, setRotorThree] = useState('I'); const [initPosOne, setInitPosingOne] = useState('A') const [initPosTwo, setInitPosingTwo] = useState('A') const [initPosThree, setInitPosingThree] = useState('A') const [ringOne, setRingOne] = useState('A') const [ringTwo, setRingTwo] = useState('A') const [ringThree, setRingThree] = useState('A') const [reflector, setReflector] = useState('UKW-C'); useEffect(() => { isValidInput(inputMessage); console.log("Input messge: ", inputMessage); // console.log("rotor1: ", rotorOne) // console.log("rotor2: ", rotorTwo) // console.log("rotor3: ", rotorThree) // console.log("initPosOne: ", initPosOne) // console.log("initPosOne: ", initPosTwo) // console.log("initPosTwo: ", initPosThree) // console.log("ringSetting one: ", ringOne) // console.log("ringSetting Two: ", ringTwo) // console.log("ringSetting Three: ", ringThree) // console.log("settings side: ", reflector) }, [inputMessage, rotorOne, rotorTwo, rotorThree, initPosOne, initPosTwo, initPosThree, ringOne, ringTwo, ringThree, reflector]) //eslint-disable-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps function isValidInput(inputMessage) { inputMessage = inputMessage.replace(/\s/g, ''); if (/^[a-zA-Z]*$/g.test(inputMessage)){ //console.log("its a valid input"); } else{ //console.log("error bad input") alert("Please use only the letters A-Z either upper or lower case.") } } // Note used Rotors from Enigma 1 Introduced in 1930. Rotors IV and V were introduced for the M3 Army Enigma in 1938 (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enigma_rotor_details) var Start = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ".split(''); var I = "EKMFLGDQVZNTOWYHXUSPAIBRCJ".split(''); var II = "AJDKSIRUXBLHWTMCQGZNPYFVOE".split(''); var III = "BDFHJLCPRTXVZNYEIWGAKMUSQO".split(''); var IV = "ESOVPZJAYQUIRHXLNFTGKDCMWB".split(''); var V = "VZBRGITYUPSDNHLXAWMJQOFECK".split(''); function rotorFast() { console.log("initial rotor value: ", I) var temp = I[0] I.shift() I.push(temp) console.log("whole arrary: ", I) console.log(temp) } rotorFast(); return (
setMessage(event.target.value)} />

) } export default Encode
